name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I came [color=#1240AB]back at home[/color], I’m sorry I didn’t [color=#CD0074]say goodbye[/color].

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I’m here again, [color=#CD0074]mother[/color]. I only accepted this mission to be on this planet [color=#C60000]one more time[/color].
